snippet: Cutting out that daily cappuccino will not let you retire in peace.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Helaine Olen dispels notion that by cutting out small luxuries people can effectively save more; contends main reason people struggle with personal finances is because salaries have stagnated at same time as costs of nonluxuries have gone up.
lead_paragraph: Cutting out that daily cappuccino will not let you retire in peace.
